name: Ocean (Alex Martínez)
description:
Ocean

A downloadable Ocean for Apple and Android

Download for Iphone       Download for Android

Ocean (Apple and Android game) is a 2D speedrun with lateral scroll and the ability to explore an aquatic environment where each level, with unique mechanics, takes us to an exciting and at the same time shocking experience on the critical state of garbage in the ocean.

The goal is to raise awareness among a young audience (12 to 16 years old) in an entertaining and up-close way, helping a sea turtle survive through the many dangers it encounters with debris in the ocean.

Brief summary of the premise

The premise of the game is to show the player the level of pollution and damage caused by human practices to the oceans and how they particularly affect the life of sea turtles. To show this, the game will take place in the stages in which contamination constitutes an even greater risk for the turtles, which are their birth and first moments of life, the search for a mate and finally the spawning on a beach.

Basic objectives

The player must dodge the various obstacles and debris that are found throughout the different levels, with their own mechanics and increasing speed in each of them, with the intention that the sea turtle will survive each stage.
